source.2c5fb949:
list2 = [5,7,9,-642,-255,-642.0,24,-5]

min_ = 0
max_ = 0

index = 0
len1 = len(list2)

while (index < len1):
    current = list2[index]
    
    if current > max_:
        max_ = current
        
    
    if current < min_:
        min_ = current
    
    index = index+1

print ("en büyük sayı: " , max_)
print ("en küçük sayı : " , min_)
